strings.SS2_CHIRR_DESCRIPTION:
Chirr is a mystical creature who holds a pure connection with the planet and its inhabitants.<color=#CCD3E0>

< ! > Life Thorns can target and track both enemies and allies. The thorns can heal and speed up allies, or damage and slow enemies.

< ! > Binding Barbs can be charged to increase the number and spread of projectiles, giving greater coverage and damage.

< ! > Sanative Aura can be used to keep yourself and allies alive, and also provide additional mobility in the air.

< ! > Natural Link allows you to befriend an enemy under 50% health, giving it a copy of your inventory. While you have an ally, you can call them to you by tapping special, and by holding special you can siphon health from them.</color>
strings.SS2_CHIRR_OUTRO_FLAVOR: ..and so she left, carrying new life in her spirit.
strings.SS2_CHIRR_OUTRO_FAILURE: ..and so she vanished, with no one left to keep her company.
strings.SS2_CHIRR_LORE:
"Will? Will, do you copy?"

"Uh, yeah, what's up?"

"Against all odds, I found something that only didn't immediately try to kill me, but actually seems genuinely friendly."

"Oh yeah? That's impressive. What is it?"

"It's, uh, a bug? Maybe? I'm not sure. It definitely looks like some sort of giant mantis, but-"

"Hold on, hold on. You said giant mantis? How big was it, you think?"

"Uh, hang on, gimme a minute..."

"...About, say, 10 feet long? And about 6 or so feet tall."

"That's... pretty big. You sure that thing is friendly?"

"Oh, absolutely. I ran into them while running away from a swarm of those wasps, and the moment I passed by it started gettin' real aggressive towards them. Spraying needles at them, headbutting the ones on the ground, and it just kept going at 'em until they flew away. Territorial? Probably, but it kinda looked like the wasps hated that thing as much as it feels they hate me."

"Huh. Well, I guess if it's keeping you safe, then by all means continue as you were."

"Alright, then. I'll keep you poste- Hmm? Something wrong, Chirr?"

"H- Hold on. Who's Chirr?"

"That's her name. The mantis, or whatever."

"...Hang on."
strings.SS2_CHIRR_PASSIVE_DESCRIPTION: Chirr <style=cIsUtility>moves faster while airborne</style>, <style=cIsUtility>jumps higher</style> and can <style=cIsUtility>glide</style> by holding the jump key.
strings.SS2_CHIRR_DARTS_DESCRIPTION: Fire a barrage of seeking thorns that <style=cIsUtility>slows</style> and deals <style=cIsDamage>3x{0}% damage</style> to enemies. Hitting allies <style=cIsUtility>accelerates</style> them and heal for <style=cIsHealing>3x{0}% health</style>.
strings.SS2_CHIRR_ROOT_DESCRIPTION: Charge up a cluster of <style=cIsDamage>rooting</style> barbs that deal <style=cIsDamage>1-5x{0}% damage</style>.
strings.SS2_CHIRR_HEADBUTT_DESCRIPTION: <style=cIsUtility>Stunning</style>. Headbutt enemies in front of you <style=cIsDamage>{0}% damage</style>.
strings.SS2_CHIRR_HEAL_DESCRIPTION: Heal yourself and nearby allies for <style=cIsHealing>{0}% of their total health</style> and <style=cIsHealing>{1}% more over time</style>.
strings.SS2_CHIRR_BEFRIEND_DESCRIPTION: <style=cIsUtility>Befriend</style> an enemy <style=cIsHealth>under 50% health</style>. <style=cIsUtility>Befriended enemies inherit items</style>.
strings.SS2_CHIRR_LEASH_DESCRIPTION: Tap to bring your ally to you. Hold to <style=cIsHealth>siphon health</style> from your friend.
